good game i want a new killer thats a total meme please i will buy it much love  just got dbd

It is an enjoyable game with s few bugs and minor problems. Playing as the Killer gives you that fun time of hunting down the Survivor and stop them from doing the generators and escaping. While you have your more eventful choice of being the Survivor and being hunted. Most Killers are nice but others will... lets just say every community has its bad side. Its the right amount of skill needed to play and just pure fun. Just remember, leaving a match doesn't solve the fact that you were knocked down. Just except it and let everyone have fun.

A+ fun game to play. Thrill to pieces hahaa.
Um jogo com muito potencial, divertido, estrat√©gico, perfeito para jogar com amigos.

I enjoyed the overall theme of the game, and playing on both Killer and Survivor sides. Win or lose the matches usually were not completely one sided and everyone seemed to have a good time. Very rare did I get poor sports from whichever losing side was. The amount of point reward could be better on the survivor side, but I think i can see why it is where it is.

The Bloodweb system for perks was amazing in that while unlocking skills and skill upgrades you earn one time use items to use in the matches. 

My only real complaint is lack of extra earnable skins. I mean, while the majority of the cosmetics were earnable, the design for the survivors wasn't the best. Felt like there was only one "acceptable" outfit for each one.

The game is a great buy, with high replay value.
game is so full of glitches, as a killer or when i play survivor, it  still has its moments of where it is fun at least. still a blast though
